spec_data.Name: beaker-client
spec_data.Description:
The bkr client is a command-line tool for interacting with Beaker servers. You
can use it to submit Beaker jobs, fetch results, and perform many other tasks.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 03 Oct 2017 11:20:57 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Command-line client for interacting with Beaker
